name: BrewMate
description: BrewMate - Homebrew App GUI Manager for macOS
author: Roman Kurnovskii

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:renderer && npm run copy:static
scripts.build:renderer: tsc src/renderer/renderer.ts --outDir dist/src/renderer --target ES2020 --module none --lib ES2020,DOM --skipLibCheck
scripts.copy:static: mkdir -p dist/src/renderer && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp src/renderer/index.html dist/src/renderer/ && cp src/renderer/styles.css dist/src/renderer/ && if [ -d src/assets ]; then cp -r src/assets/* dist/assets/; elif [ -d assets ]; then cp -r assets/* dist/assets/; fi
